name: Chiaroscuro (King Zhou)
description:
Explore a whimsical world of light and shadow, while the blinking between black and white blurs the edge of reality...

This is an entry of CiGA Game Jam 2022, solo developed within 48 hours. All assets and codes are created by me.

Public resource used: Footsteps - Essentials | Foley Sound FX | Unity Asset Store

Instruction: move with the keyboard, and rotate the view with the mouse.

游戏介绍：黑白闪烁模糊了现实的边界，在光与影交错的世界中探索未知...

本游戏为CiGA Game Jam2022参与作品

全部资产、代码均由本人@ZYM35 独立完成

公共资源：Footsteps - Essentials | Foley Sound FX | Unity Asset Store

操作说明：键盘控制移动，鼠标控制视角

Windows平台游玩，下载后解压打开exe即可

BiliBili游玩视频：https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1DN4y137zZ?share_source=copy_web
